name: Senior Year Adventure
description:
Senior Year Adventure is a re-release of an RPG Maker 2000 game "Licealista" that I made in 2005 for my sister, approaching her final year exams.

It was the first game I have ever created and my first experience with coding (through visual scripting the built-in events system).

For this release, following features were added:

  • Translation from Polish to English
  • Linux support
Instructions

Controls: Arrows for movement, Z to confirm, X to open the menu or go back.

Running the game:

  • Windows:
    Run play_windows.exe.
  • Linux:
    Run play_linux.sh.
    An installation of EasyRPG dependencies might be required.
Credits

Assets used in this game are not mine. I do not claim any ownership to them. They were the part of the RPG Maker 2000 installation that I used back in 2005.

This game uses EasyRPG which is published under GPL v3.

Other

I would like to acknowledge that RPG Maker 2000 is still a very viable entry-level game making tool. Available for cheap on Steam. Can be used on Linux thanks to Wine.

Paired with EasyRPG it also supports multi-platform releases.
